r.s: Resolver library used to communicate with a DNS server
r.d: A resolver library used to communicate with a name server to perform DNS queries, zone transfers, dynamic DNS updates, etc. Creates an object hierarchy from a DNS server's response, which allows you to view all of the information given by the DNS server. It bypasses the system's resolver library and communicates directly with the server.
r.n: Fixed all pending bugs Ensured php5 compatibility
